title: Chanel Tests Purse Lovers With $3,000 Price Hikes
sub_head: Luxury brand cites higher materials costs for raising handbag prices three times in a year
body:
Chanel SAâ€™s small Classic Flap bag was always a luxury item, but after three price hikes last year, it is selling for $8,200. That is up from the $5,200 it cost in 2019.
The French fashion house has been raising prices at a faster pace than other luxury brands, analysts say, prompting an outcry from some shoppers and testing their willingness to pay.
